ICS 160E/EECS 114 - Algorithms Homework 2, 50 Points
Due: Monday, April 22, 2005, at 3pm in the ICS Distribution Center

  1. 10 points. Problem R-2.3 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  2. 10 points. Problem R-2.4 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  3. 10 points. Problem C-2.2 from Goodrich-Tamassia. For a hint, click here.
  4. 10 points. Problem C-2.3 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  5. 10 points. Problem C-2.4 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
